title: ‘Pikmin 4′ is not only real, but nearly finished
content:
'Pikmin , Finished , Nearly , Only , real 
 
 You may have had to wait the better part of a decade to get a third Pikmin game, but its follow-up won't take nearly so long. Nintendo's Shigeru Miyamoto has revealed to Eurogamer that his company is not only working on Pikmin 4, but that it's "ver…
